p:
We downloaded scenarios from these six models for the years 2030, 2050 and 2070 ( http://www.climatechangeinaustralia.gov.au), and reprojected all data to a spatial resolution of 1 km × 1 km (Australian Albers Equal Area, EPSG: 3577) through bilinear interpolation, using the gdalwarp function provided by the R package gdalUtils
32 , in R version 3.3.3
33 .
